page.title: 03EVENTS ON PARKWOOD
page.content: There are many events that take place on Parkwood Green. Fairs are the most popular and they are usually held in the school holidays or at weekends. Usually there are about 100-200 people who attend each event and an enjoyable time is had by all. On the 6th. May 1985 there was a free fair. The food was at quite reasonable prices - hot dogs - 25p, beefburgers - 30p and the drinks were reasonable too. There were inflatable castles for the younger children to play on. Boot fairs are regular events also. These are organised by the schools' Parents' Association to raise extra funds for the school children. There are many activities there and lots of stalls selling odd bits and pieces.
